lead_paragraph: KOREY--Doris Broder. The Saul R. Korey Department of Neurology of the Albert Einstein College of Medicine is deeply saddened by the death of the wife of our late Founding Chair. Although the legacy of Dr. Korey is deep and profound, the societal contributions of his wife and partner have been equally impressive throughout her long life: as a pioneering social worker, as an activist in voter registration drives to support social justice, as a student of genealogy studies, as an ardent supporter of Israel, as a lover of learning and knowledge and as mother to Suzanne, Cathie and the late Barry, the latter two of whom were Einstein medical students, as well as a loving grandmother. We send our heartfelt condolences to the entire extended Korey family. Mark F. Mehler, M.D. Alpern Professor and University Chairman, The Saul R. Korey Department of Neurology Albert Einstein College of Medicine 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KOREY, DORIS BRODER
